div.p:
Circa prologum Sententiarum
Magistri Petri Plaoul While an important addition that identifies the author of this text, it is also out of place. The text is clearly referring to the prologue of Lombard "in which he [Lombard] says." It seems likely that later scribes somewhat violently added Plaoul's name here as part of a way to identify the author of the present commentary.
